author: Antares

content:
To Change which POI Categories are Displayed​
Touch View Map
Touch the 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	


 menu icon in the lower right corner to open Map Tools
Some devices may display a 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 menu or 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 wrench icon, or 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 menu in this spot

Touch Up Ahead. On the right side of the screen, the device will display icons or descriptions of the POI categories displayed on the map.
Touch any of the icon categories on the right
Touch the
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 wrench icon in the upper left corner
Touch the category you wish to change
Touch the + icon next to the desired POI category or Custom Search a business name or category
If desired, hold down and drag the 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	


 arrow icons on the right to change the order of the categories
Touch Save
For POI icons to be visible, your device must be in an active route (i.e. the device is currently navigating to a specific point) and the map must be zoomed in to at least 0.8 miles. The farther zoomed out the map is, the fewer POI icons will be displayed. Beyond 0.8 miles, only the icons for saved locations will be shown.
Although POI icons will be visible in all three map views, the zoom level will only be shown in the North Up and Track Up views.
